data.message: Really wish I could see today post/most resent post. But I guess I'll just live with seeing the same 6 post from yesterday and or the day before. Thanks for making sure I see a post I not only commented on but also liked every time I open Facebook for a week straight I would have missed it other wise.

replies.message: Hey Anthony. Visit our Help Center for step-by-step instructions on how to change the order of the stories that appear in your News Feed: http://bit.ly/2bE3Eil. Thanks! -Jessica

All that tells me is I can temporarily change my feed to most recent. And then when I close the app it goes back to showing the same 6 post from yesterday or the day before.  Thanks for the help but hey at least you guys have all the adds are from today.
Facebook where is my response?????    Hahaha!!  Take your head out of the sand.
Like I got a notification that someone else replied to my comment but I can't see it... Most likely because he posted it today. Tomorrow I'm sure it will be available

Such BS, FB. I've had the EXACT same stories in my feed for the last two days. So I get to hear about my friends dead cat repeatedly with absolutely no NEW stories. for 2 straight days! I also have a page with 42,000 followers and I am one day from shutting both down and my using IG solely.
